text: Vigo del Arco in 2018. Martí Vigo del Arco (born December 22, 1997) is a Spanish skier who participated in the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==Biography== He started practicing sports at three years of age in Llanos del Hospital. In 2014, 2016 and 2017 he participated in the Junior World Championships, achieving in his last participation a 14th place in the 10 kilometer event. This result earned him the Carolina Ruiz award, awarded by the Spanish Federation to the best athlete with a projection. His first appearance in the World Cup was in 2018 in Dresden , finishing in 67th place and 22nd in team. == Results in the Olympic Games == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Location ! Date !
